description:
Description
A multi-caring body wash helps cleansing, exfoliating and moisturizing for a smooth clear body.Formulated with 0.5% Salicylic Acid to tackle blemishes head-on and protect weak skin from breakouts.Enriched wtih Cica, Panthenol and Niacinamide to soothe irritated and dry skin, strengthen skin barrier and brighten skin tone in one go.Provides gentle exfoliation and removes excess sebum and dead skin cells with AHA, BHA and LHA, while replenishing deep hydration to dry skin with PHA after cleansing.Features a refreshing cool apple mint scent. 
How To Use1. Take a moderate amount and lather up by massaging.2. Rinse off thoroughly with lukewarm water.
 
Key Ingredients
Water, Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Coco-Betaine, Propanediol, Cocamide Methyl MEA, Glycerin, Centella Asiatica Leaf Water (5880ppm), Panthenol, Niacinamide, Centella Asiatica Extract (20ppm), Asiaticoside (0.6ppm), Madecassic Acid (0.3ppm), Asiatic Acid (0.3ppm), Madecassoside (0.3ppm), Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Monarda Didyma Leaf Extract, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Leaf Extract, Freesia Refracta Extract, Salicylic Acid, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Origanum Vulgare Extract, Magnolia Officinalis Bark Extract, Agrimonia Pilosa Extract, Dendrobium Nobile Extract, Pogostemon Cablin Leaf Extract, Terminalia Chebula Fruit Extract, Gluconolactone, Capryloyl Salicylic Acid, Olea Europaea (Olive) Leaf Extract, Zinc PCA, Sodium Hyaluronate, Ascorbic Acid, Ascorbyl Glucoside, Butylene Glycol, Trideceth-10, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Chloride, 1,2-Hexanediol, Pentylene Glycol, Tetradecene, Hexadecene, Tromethamine, Polyquaternium-10, Ethylhexylglycerin, Citric Acid, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Sulfate, Fragrance

description:
Description

Acne body wash for sensitive, bumpy, and rough skin. Our Carrotene line has come to rescue your body! Are you using body scrubs? Physical exfoliation is NOT a friend of body acne. In your everyday shower, our Carrotene IPMP™ X Salicylic Acid formula will target KP(Keratosis pilaris), strawberry legs, bacne, boobne, butt acne, etc. Facial-grade/non-irritating Carrotene IPMP™ Exfoliating Body Wash perfectly balances moisturization and exfoliation. Get silky smooth skin after just 1 use.

How To Use

1.Lather on wet body with hands or a loofah.
2. Apply thoroughly to areas that are prone to acne, such as between the shoulder blades, sternum, and dry elbows.
3. Rinse with water.
Tips: Use the We Carrot 'bout You Loofah to lather using a small amount of product.

description:
Description


[High-Performance Body Care for Acne-Prone Skin] Reduces pore-clogging impurities, perfect for maintaining clean, healthy skin, especially for acne-prone individuals. [High-Performance Body Care for Acne-Prone Skin] Reduces pore-clogging impurities, perfect for maintaining clean, healthy skin, especially for acne-prone individuals.
[Clinically Tested ] Clinically proven relieve body irritation, free from allergen-forming ingredients. Clinically tested for sensitive skin, balancing the skin's pH level (5.5 - 6.5) to maintain hydration, prevent dryness, and alleviate symptoms of acne-prone skin.
[Key Ingredients] Infused with Niacinamide, Salicylic Acid, and Hyaluronic Acid in the MEDI-SOL COMPLEX, providing gentle exfoliation, acne relief, hydration, and soothing relief for sensitive skin.
[Natural Scent & Antioxidant Formula] Enjoy a light, natural scent for daily use, powered by antioxidant-rich, nature-derived extracts, delivering both fragrance and antioxidant benefits.
[Direction for Use] Use this mild, low pH body wash to soothe and cleanse the skin. Apply to damp skin, lather gently, and rinse thoroughly.

reviews.title: Body Wash
reviews.content: I know this body wash is popular with people with body acne. I do not have body acne, but I have dry and sensitive skin. This is amazing for my skin type. I use it with an exfoliating towel. It helps get rid of dead skin cells and makes my skin so soft after use. Leaves no residue after rinse. Gentle enough to use daily. The smell is also very nice, slightly medicinal and not overpowering. Over time, I notice scars on my body getting lighter too.

product_name: Daily Moisture Body Wash Fresh Peach 1000ml
description:
Description
- HYPOALLERGENIC GENTLE CLEANSER: This body wash has a low pH level of 5.5 which is similar to the skin's level so that makes your skin moist without dryness or irritation, even if you take showers frequently- ABUNDANT & DENSE FOAM: The rich and dense foam cleanses the body wastes effectively and does not strip skin of moisture/ Date on the package is not the expiration date but the date of manufacture- DEEPLY HYDRATING BODY WASH: Hyaluronic acid, Shea Butter, and Panthenol keep your dry skin deeply moisturized and hydrated while grape seed oil nourishes your skin- REFRESHING & SWEET FRESH PEACH SCENT makes you feel refreshed and comfortable. Base notes: musk, amber. Middle notes: green-note, jasmine. Top note: peach- HYDRATING & MOISTURIZING BODY WASH: Special patented MLE formula provides faster absorption and prevents moisture evaporation, providing long-lasting moisturizing. Big size makes it comfortable to use for the whole family
How To UseApply gel to wet body and distribute evenly with gentle massaging motions. Rinse off with water.

description:
Description


A skin calming body wash that helps soothes irritated skin with deep hydration.
Contains pine tree and five centella asiatica-derived ingredient to quickly and effectively cool and soothe irritated and troubled skin.
Enriched with AHA, BHA and PHA to removes and exfoliate accumulated dead skin to reveal soft skin.
Presents gel texture that can build up to fluffy foam, penetrates on pores to remove skin impurities thoroughly.
Leaves your skin moisturized even after cleansing wih 3 types of Hyaluronic Acids.
Completed skin irritation test, suitable for sensitive skin.
 
How To Use

1. Get a moderate amount on a shower ball and lather it.
2. Massage the entire body except the face and rinse with water.

description:
Description

- Glutathione Niacinamide Body Wash / LIPO GLUTA NIAC CEN 5.3% (Glutathione 1,000ppm, Niacinamide 1,000ppm, Centella Asiatica Extract 5.1%), combined with Centella 3x Complex
- CENTELLA 3X COMPLEX: The following components of Madecassic Acid, Asiaticoside, and Asiatic Acid come from a leaf called “Centella asiatica”.
- PRESERVE THE MOISTURE: Infused with Hyaluronic Acid and Beta Glucan
- SHINE AND GLOW: Infused with Vitamin C, Niacinamide (Vitamin B3 and Nicotinamide)
- ALLEVIATE FOR SENSITIVE SKIN: Solanum Melongena (Eggplant) extract- Moisturiaing Effect Even After Washing- Removes Waste and Supplies Moisture- Gentle Cleansing- Elastic Skin Care- Revitalize Dull Skin- Maintain Oil- Moisture Balance- Protect Dry and Sensitive Skin- Rich and Dense Microbubbles 

How To Use
Take an appropriate amount, lather, gently massage the whole body, and then rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water.

Water, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Centella Asiatica Extract (5.1%), Glycerin, Propylene Glycol, Cocamide MEA, Lauramide DEA, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glutathione (1,000ppm), Niacinamide (1,000ppm), Citric Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Glyceryl Stearate, Cholesterol, Nelumbo Nucifera Extract, Artemisia Annua Extract, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Extract, Saccharomyces Ferment, Solanum Melongena (Eggplant) Fruit Extract, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Extract, 1,2-Hexanediol, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Beta-Glucan, Dipropylene Glycol, Hippophae Rhamnoides Fruit Extract, Butylene Glycol, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Xanthan Gum, Madecassic Acid, Asiaticoside, Asiatic Acid, Squalane, Polyquaternium-10, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Benzoate, Chlorphenesin, Sodium Chloride

description:
Description

- BODY AC TROUBLE CARE SOLUTION: AC Control Body Wash takes care of the excessive sebum inside the skin that is the main reason for body skin troubles
- OIL AND MOISTURE BALANCE: AC Control Body Wash removes only unnecessary sebum, while 8 types of Hyaluronic acid lock in moisture to maintain the optimal oil-moisture balance
- 3-IN-1 BODY WASH WITH REFRESHING SCENT: Exfoliation, sebum control, and anti-blemish care

How To Use
During a shower, after soaking a sponge or bath towel in plenty of water, take an appropriate amount, lather gently, massage it, and then rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water.

description:
Description


Gentle cleansing foam for the intimate area contains natural safe ingredients, effectively cleanses, moisturizes, soothes and eliminates unpleasant sensations of itching, gives a feeling of comfort and a feeling of freshness for the whole day. 
Specially formulated for daily intimate hygiene, it has a reduced pH of 4.5 ~ 6.5, which helps maintain a normal acid-base balance and heals delicate skin.

How To Use
Apply a small amount of foam to the intimate area of the body, then rinse with water

description:
Description


1. Contains only essential ingredients to make it gentler and moister: Helps maintain healthy Y-zone by excluding 26 ingredients that can be harmful to the human body.
2. Skin irritation test completed: It was judged as non-irritating through the human skin patch test of the Korean Dermatological Research Institute.
3. EWG Green Grade: All EWG Green grade ingredients contain only mild and moisturizing ingredients that can be safely used on the skin.
4. Moisturize itchy skin due to dryness: If itchy due to dryness, feel refreshed with moist green tea and propolis extract.

Suggested Use



Take an appropriate amount on clean, wet hands and gently massage like a massage, then rinse thoroughly with water.
*Tip: It is recommended to use it 2-3 times a week, and it is even better if you use it on a day when you sweat or get wet.

description:
Description

-Mild and gentle bath and shampoo 
-Acid balanced pH and contains natural oil derived cleansing compounds for a mild and moisturizer cleansing

Suggested Use

Dispense the right amount onto hands or a towel for bathing or washing the face. 
Work into a rich lather, and gently rub using massaging motions. 
Apply product to the head and entire body to cleanse. Then, rinse with lukewarm water.

Key Ingredients

WATER/AQUA, DISODIUM COCOYL GLUTAMATE, DISODIUM COCOAMPHODIACETATE, PROPANEDIOL, GLYCERIN, SODIUM CHLORIDE, COCO-GLUCOSIDE, XANTHAN GUM, SODIUM SWEETALMONDAMPHOACETATE, MYRISTOYL/PALMITOYL OXOSTEARAMIDE/ARACHAMIDE MEA, SIMMONDSIA CHINENSIS (JOJOBA) SEED OIL, HELIANTHUS ANNUUS (SUNFLOWER) SEED OIL, VITIS VINIFERA (GRAPE) SEED OIL, CARTHAMUS TINCTORIUS (SAFFLOWER) SEED OIL, CAMELLIA SINENSIS SEED OIL, CENTELLA ASIATICA EXTRACT, MADECASSOSIDE, COCODIMONIUM HYDROXYPROPYL HYDROLYZED WHEAT PROTEIN, SODIUM PHYTATE, CITRIC ACID, SODIUM CITRATE, HEXYLENE GLYCOL, 1,2-HEXANEDIOL, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, ARTEMISIA VULGARIS OIL, SANTALUM ALBUM (SANDALWOOD) OIL

description:
Description

This body wash contains Lavender & Marjoram essential oil that help relax the body and mind and hydrate the skin with plant-derived ingredient without irritation.
Lavender essential oil has the property of calming unstable moods and raising energy levels of an irritating and lethargic state. In addition, we blended marjoram essential oil that sharpens unnecessary emotions and builds inner strength. The gel-type formula creates light and rich bubbles. Massage the entire body with the bubbles then rinse off thoroughly with lukewarm water. The healthy oil ingredients soften and moisturize the skin, while ensuring inner peace of mind.

Suggested Use

Massage the entire body with the bubbles then rinse off thoroughly with lukewarm water.

Key Ingredients

Lavandula angustifolia extract, Aqua, Sodium cocoyl isethionate(Coconut-derived cleanser), Lauryl betaine(Plant-derived cleanser), Sodium methyl cocoyl taurate(Coconut-derived cleanser), Lauryl glucoside(Corn-derived cleanser), Sodium chloride, Coco-betaine(Coconut-derived cleanser), 1,2-Hexanediol(Emollient), Caprylyl glycol(Emollient),Tetrasodium iminodisuccinate(Stabilizer), Panthenol(Vitamin B5), Potassium hydroxide(pH regulator), *Linalool(Ingredient in Lavender oil), Ethylhexylglycerin(Emollient), *Lavandula angustifolia oil, *Lavandula hybrida oil, Polyquaternium-10(Emollient), *Limonene(Ingredient in Bergamot oil), *Styrax benzoin gum(Benzoin oil), *Citrus aurantium bergamia fruit oil, *Canarium luzonicum gum oil(Elemi oil), *Origanum majorana leaf oil
*Naturally found in essential oil(s)

product_name: Vitalizing Rosemary All In One Wash 300ml
description:
Description

Rosemary energizes body and mind, with the plant-based cleansing ingredients of the all-in-one washer gently cleansing the face, body, hands, and hair without causing irritation 

* A pleasant shower ritual with dense & soft foam massage :
The transparent gel texture creates light and rich bubbles. Massage and wash the entire body with moisturizing foam that soothes skin, and rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water.
* Refreshing, moisturizing sensation with plant-derived ingredients : 
The cleaning compound derived from Coconut oil cleanses impurities and helps hydrate skin for safe use even on sensitive skin. 
* From top to toe, All-In-One care : 
The all-in-one cleanser containing natural ingredients gently washes all areas from sensitive face to body and hair; safe for children to use.

Suggested Use

Moisten your hands with warm water and lather a small amount of the gel in your hands. Apply to face, body or hair and massage in. Rinse off thoroughly with warm water. 

Key Ingredients

Natural ingredients 98.6%Aqua, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Lauryl Betaine, Sodium Chloride, Coco-Betaine, Lauryl Glucoside, 1,2-Hexanediol, *Rosmarinus Officinalis Leaf Oil, Potassium Hydroxide, Caprylyl Glycol, Butylene Glycol, *Cedrus Atlantica Bark Oil, Illicium Verum Fruit Extract, *Cupressus Sempervirens Oil, *Abies Sibirica Oil, *Styrax Benzoin Gum, *Limonene, Tetrasodium Iminodisuccinate
*Naturally found in essential oils
